name: Sofea
greetingText: Hope this might cheer ya up even if just a lil bit
wishText: Looking forward for more years with you ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text3: But then I wanted to do it differently this time
text4: I wanted to do something a bit more
outroText: ps; ur presents are arriving later than I thought sorry
replayText: Come back to me and tell me what u think or click to replay.
